content.title: Land Ports Authority Of India (LPAI) Internship Scheme
content.beneficiary: Students and research scholars from BBIN countries (Bhutan, India, Nepal, and Bangladesh)
content.details: The Land Ports Authority of India (LPAI) is pleased to announce its annual internship program for the academic year 2024-25. This program provides a unique opportunity for students and research scholars from BBIN countries to gain practical experience in land port development, cross-border trade, passenger movement, and border issues.
benefits: Reimbursement for economy-class airfare and taxi travel for visits to land ports
Boarding and lodging arrangements at the land port visited
eligibility: Indian students from recognized universities in India or abroad with a minimum of 60% marks in their most recent degree or certificate examination
Completion of education under the 10+2+3 schooling pattern
Pursuing the 4th year in the Engineering stream under the 10+2+4 pattern
Pursuing the 4th or 5th year in the integrated degree course or dual degree under the 10+2+5 pattern
Completion of the 2nd year of Engineering or Science course from any IIT or NIT
Pursuing M. Tech/M.Eng./MCA from a prestigious institute
Completion of the 2nd year in the law degree from a prestigious Law Institute/University
content.application_process: Online application through the Authority's website or https://www.myscheme.gov.in/. Applications must be sponsored by the candidate's educational institution.
documents_required: Passing Certificate / Degree / Marksheet of Graduation / Post Graduation
A Letter from the Supervisor / Head of the Department / Principal indicating their Status in the Institution
No Objection Certificate (NOC) from the Institution
Identity Card / Proof of Enrolment into the Institute
Details of the Bank Account (for the disbursement of stipend)

faqs.question: What Information Should Be Mentioned In The Mail To The Director (Operations), LPAI?
faqs.answer: Interested and eligible students must send their applications, CV, and areas of work interest along with two references in the prescribed application form to the Official Email ID of the Director (Operations), LPAI: dir.opr-lpai@gov.in

faqs.question: What Is The Official Email ID Of The Director (Operations), LPAI?
faqs.answer: The Official Email ID of the Director (Operations), LPAI is dir.opr-lpai@gov.in

faqs.question: Will The Interns Who Are Taken In After The Relaxation Of The Outlined Qualification Be Paid Any Remuneration?
faqs.answer: No, the Interns who are taken in after the relaxation of the outlined qualification shall not be paid any remuneration.

faqs.question: Can The Candidate Email The Application Without Any Sponsorship?
faqs.answer: The applications need to be sponsored by the institution of the candidate seeking an internship.

faqs.question: Will The Selection Process Involve A Personal Or Telephonic Interview?
faqs.answer: The selection committee may conduct a personal or telephonic interview if required.
